title: ［突破］國泰&港龍，洋人機師要知道，他們罷工最有力

replies.msg:
各位，如題。

機師都有自己工會，我地務必要令佢地郁手！

請各位幫忙將以下訊息傳俾佢地！

航空業罷工係核彈的話，
機師罷工就係氫彈！



Aviation Workers Please Join Strike!

Aviation Workers Strike is as strong as nuclear explosion! We need to take back the vigor, and follow up a victory with hot pursuit.

Whatever there is strike in the whole airport or just Cathay Pacific / Cathay Dragon or just strike from crew members, the strike from the crew are always effective.

All the planes stuck in the apron and make them keep paying the hugh apron fee will be a good way to make them co-opreate together.

We are on the same boat and we do not allow any kind of white terror and limiting personal freedom and freedom of speech.

This can be very lethal, especially not all the people know how to fly a plane and serve in the plane.

It's the time for you captain and the crew.
國泰手足都諗諗，今次唔係搞你，下次都會係搞你
